content.text: Relationship with standard Sequence and IteratorProtocol

inlineContent.text: Cursors share traits with lazy sequences and iterators from the Swift
Cursor types are classes, and have a lifetime.
A cursor can not be repeated.
The protocol comes with default implementations for many operations similar
to those defined by Swift’s Sequence protocol:
